remarks: Chained distributive law for Hilbert space operator difference. (Contributed by NM, 30-Nov-2000.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
pjsdi2.1 $e |- H e. CH $.
pjsdi2.2 $e |- R : ~H --> ~H $.
pjsdi2.3 $e |- S : ~H --> ~H $.
pjsdi2.4 $e |- T : ~H --> ~H $.
pjsdi2i $p |- ( ( R o. ( S +op T ) ) = ( ( R o. S ) +op ( R o. T ) ) -> ( ( ( projh ` H ) o. R ) o. ( S +op T ) ) = ( ( ( ( projh ` H ) o. R ) o. S ) +op ( ( ( projh ` H ) o. R ) o. T ) ) ) $.
